amendment.description: To improve the HIRE Vets Medallion Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 192 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 192 proposed by Senator Sullivan for Senator Blunt. (consideration: CR S1897; text: CR S1897) To improve the HIRE Vets Medallion Program.
